name: Red Pepper Puree
keywords: red bell pepper, vegan, vegetarian, winter
recipeIngredient: Salt and freshly ground black pepper, to taste

recipeInstructions.text: Place peppers under high broiler, 3 inches from heat, turning until they blister and lightly blacken. Or hold over gas flame with long-handled fork, until blistered and lightly blackened.
Place peppers in a plastic bag for 5 minutes; remove, peel and seed.
Puree in food processor until smooth. Add salt and pepper
